snippet: Wednesday’s highlights from around the web include the latest in what appears to be a brewing rivalry between Facebook and Snapchat. Plus, what does Imgur, one of the most visited sites online, want to be when it grows up?
abstract: Wednesday’s highlights from around the web include the latest in what appears to be a brewing rivalry between Facebook and Snapchat. Plus, what does Imgur, one of the most visited sites online, want to be when it grows up?

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Snapchat Steals an Executive From Facebook, and the Future of Imgur
